channel.title: About Life on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in About Life on Hello World

item.title: What Kind of a Person Am I
item.description: What kind of a person am I ? It has always been habitual to wrap up in disguise in front of others, not wanting them to see that bad self. These disguises, layer upon layer, to the point that now, even I can not recognize myself. The actual fact is that you can find a lot of people who are not able to get the best out of the company. The same is true of the students around you, but they don’t seem to be as depressed as I am, or perhaps everyone is used to hiding it. This is the first time that I’ve been thinking about what I really want, and whether I’m really lost.

item.title: 2020 Year End Reflection
item.description: 2021 年已经过去 13 天了。 这篇总结已经被我拖了小半个月。准确的说，是逃避。逃避考研的失败，逃避别人的目光，逃避内心的自己。 今年是近 4 年来，经历事情最多的 1 年，也是最为充实的 1 年。 1 月中旬，我正式着手准备考研
